item.title: Orion’s ‘Is God Is’ Lands High-Profile Summer 2026 Release in Theaters (Exclusive)
item.description: The movie adaptation of Aleshea Harris’ award-winning stage play is from Amazon MGM’s prestige label and stars Kara Young, Mallori Johnson, Sterling K. Brown, Vivica A. Fox and Janelle Monáe.

item.title: ‘Washington Black’ EP on Telling a Coming-of-Age Story About Identity With Debut Book ‘Beyond the Paddock’
item.description: Kimberly Ann Harrison’s novel follows the lives of two teenagers from the foster care system who navigate the newness and challenges of horseback riding.

item.title: ‘Washington Black’ Review: Sterling K. Brown in a Hulu Drama That Tackles Heavy History With Disarming Lightness of Spirit
item.description: Adapted from Esi Edugyan’s 2018 novel, the miniseries chronicles the globe-trotting adventures of a boy who escapes slavery in Barbados and winds up in Nova Scotia.
